mapper.select: SELECT i.barcode, w.warehouseName, p.storedType, c.categoryMid, c.categorySub, p.productName, i.quantity, i.expirationDate FROM Inventory i JOIN Warehouse w ON i.warehouseCode = w.warehouseCode JOIN Product p ON i.productCode = p.productCode JOIN Category c ON p.categoryCode = c.categoryCode
SELECT DISTINCT w.warehouseName FROM Inventory i JOIN Warehouse w ON i.warehouseCode = w.warehouseCode
